knimeNode.name: RDKit Molecule Substructure Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies a number of substructure filters to an input RDKit Mol column

fullDescription.intro: Applies a substructure filter to an input RDKit Mol column. The patterns are given as RDKit molecules in the second input table. You can choose either a minimum number of patterns to match or to require that all match.
fullDescription.option: Select the column from the first input table that contains the RDKit molecules
Select the column from the second input table that contains the query RDKit molecules
Select the minimum number of patterns that must match for each molecule so that it is included in the first output table

ports.inPort: Table with RDKit molecules to use as queries
ports.outPort: Molecules not matching the substructure query
